DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to increase the radiation dose (Boost) to the bladder tumor. The bladder cancer patients included in the study will undergo tumor demarcation. The bladder demarcations will then be the target for an image-guided boost delivered precisely to the expected tumor site.
DOC.criteria: Muscle invasive bladder cancer (transitional carcinoma) Unifocal TNM stage T2a4a, N01, M0 unfit for radical cystectomy Hyperthyroidism Multinodular goiter Pregnancy Breast feeding WHO preformance status more than 2 Iodine allergy MRI or CT contrast media allergy Bilateral hipprosthesis
